column4: I need to connect to a windows VPN from ubuntu, but I don't see the VPN option in network manager, even though I've installed network-manager-pptp
have you restarted the network applet ?
is there supposed to be a VPN tab or something?
can you see the 2 monitors next to the time ?
yes, I see the icon with the fore- and background monitor
ok, after u installed the network-pptp package have u closed that applet and opened again ?
yes, I restarted the applet -- I even restarted the machine -- but I still don't see a VPN option
which options appear when u left click the icon ?
u can't use roaming mode with your actual network configuration can u ?
yes, I can use roaming mode
because i had the same problem, but using roaming mode  the vpn option magically appear
must be a bug in the applet
well.. u can report the bug if u want =)
